name: Ichabodcole.github.com
body:
### Designer / Creative Coder.
Currently attending [Portland Code School](http://www.portlandcodeschool.com/)

### [BinauralJS](https://github.com/ichabodcole/BinauralJS)
A Javascript/CoffeeScript library for generating binaural beats using the Web Audio API
More on binaural beats [Here] (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Binaural_beats)
```
context = new.webkitAudioContext()
bn1 = new BinauralBeat(context, frequency, beatRate)
bn1Node = bn1.getNode()
bn1Node.connect(context.destination)
```


### [NoiseGenJS](https://github.com/ichabodcole/NoiseGenJS)
A Javascript/CoffeeScript library for generating several types of ambient noise using the Web Audio API.
```
context = new.webkitAudioContext()
ng1 = new NoiseGen(context, frequency, beatRate)
ng1Node = ng1.getNode()
ng1Node.connect(context.destination)
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
